function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Focussing on three very different cities -jerusalem, phnom penh and torontothey reveal how histories of colonial occupation and planning, of postcolonial economic modernization and of entrepreneurial planning geared to promoting competitive global cities have produced conditions germane to the uneven spread and impacts of covid-19.","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to eliminate covid-19 from the workplace","category":"Working","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited effectiveness of control measures","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Air recirculation can transport infectious contaminants through spaces, leading to the re-entry of virus particles into workstations.","category":"Working","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to close recirculation dampers can lead to the distribution of airborne contaminants from one point to others connected to the same system.","category":"Working","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misconceptions about the effectiveness of hepa filters in capturing coronaviruses","category":"Working","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of administrative controls to minimize exposure to sars-cov-2 in workplace environments.","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of personal protective equipment ppe to prevent the transmission of contagious diseases in workplace environments.","category":"Working","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to use proper ppe","category":"Working","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper fit or seal of respirators","category":"Working","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on outdated guidelines for controlling covid-19 transmission in workplaces.","category":"Working","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of expert team for the implementation of effective control measures in the workplace.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unidentified text content","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of surface hygiene and cleaning protocols","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Text mentions the spread of contagious diseases in built environments at all scales.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transfer of viruses from individuals to surfaces and vice versa through contact","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survival of sars-cov-2 on different surfaces, indicating potential for fomite transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of sars-cov-2 through fecal-oral pathway","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper handwashing and hygiene practices","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate use and handling of masks","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The spread of sars-cov-2 through aerosolized water droplets from sink areas","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective handwashing and hand sanitizing protocols","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in the number of individuals contracting covid-19 and being exposed to sars-cov-2","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes required after original publication","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Unclear acknowledgment of contributors","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Non-standardized data collection and terminology","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges of data sharing","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Timely generation and dissemination of data","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious disease transmission through primary data collection and sharing","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perception of science and research funding","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possibility of incomplete data capture due to studies not using specified search terms","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for transmission of covid-19 in the process of real-world evidence research","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate categorization of study topics and designs leading to misinterpretation of data","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large-scale data collection and sharing may lead to potential privacy breaches and data security risks.","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collaborative data sharing across multiple countries may lead to cross-border legal and regulatory challenges.","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited coverage of commercial covid-19 ehr data in regions outside north america","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic recession highlighting risks associated with hyper-connected economic and financial systems","category":"Wealth production","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global connectivity and trade promote the use of cheap and long-distance transportation, increasing the risk of contagious diseases spreading globally.","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Restricted mobility and economic activity during the covid-19 crisis led to improved air quality but uncertain impact on climate change and biodiversity conservation.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of policies addressing the interrelation between biodiversity conservation, food security, and pandemic prevention","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tropical deforestation and wildlife trade increasing the risk of future zoonosis outbreaks","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic growth contributing to biodiversity loss and environmental degradation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with public health measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased likelihood of contagious diseases due to individualistic societies and unsustainable consumption patterns","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 crisis","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through collaborative research and writing activities.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 pandemic with over 107 million infections and 2.4 million deaths worldwide.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious diseases propagation due to group-level analysis","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of factors at the group level differing from individual level","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of socio-economic factors on covid-19 transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"}]}
